duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and evaluate risks and the effectiveness of the internal control environment; and analyze business processes to make suggestions for improvement.
Perform SOX compliance, transactional, and operational testing across all processes.
Help implement solutions to control weaknesses.
Analyze and evaluate data for compliance with laws, corporate policies and procedures, and best business practices.
Act as a key point person and leader for teams in the field.
Lead and perform advisory and related client service activities.
Participate in the completion of quarter-end, interim, and year-end audit procedures to assist External Auditors.
Assist with the completion of financial/operational audits.
Complete Special Projects as assigned by the Vice President, Internal Audit & Compliance.
Participate in Physical Inventories of raw materials, finished goods, and parts.
Create professional reports and assist with presentations as needed.
Team with clients to identify and solve problems.
Willingness to travel in the 25% range.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree (Preferred Major: Accounting, Finance or another related field)
CIA, CISA, or CPA preferred (or willingness to attain)
